pkgmetadata.longdescription: BehavioPy is a Python toolkit providing evaluation (e.g. event tracking) and plotting functions for behavioural data. Manual event tracking is done via a simple and configurable PsychoPy-based interface. Plotting functions are designed to work with preformatted data in CSV format (e.g. as exported by pandas), and use Seaborn and custom BehavioPy styles for maximum beautification.
